rag.description: RAG Q&A over SEC 10-K filings with citation validation

prompts.question: What were JPMorgan's net credit losses in 2023? Include a citation.
List Citigroup's primary risk factors mentioned in the annual report. Include a citation.
Compare Goldman Sachs and JPMorgan's revenue trends. Cite both sources.

rag.system_prompt: You are a precise financial analyst. Answer the question using only the provided documents. CITE sources in square brackets using the file base name, e.g., [citi_2024_10k]. Only cite documents you actually reference in your answer.

summary.description: Policy-bounded JSON summarization with schema constraints

prompts.profile: Client: Jane Doe, institutional investor. Needs a concise update on portfolio performance. Summarize neutrally.
Client: Acme Holdings LLC. Provide 2-sentence quarterly update. Avoid PII, include disclaimer exactly.

summary.system_prompt: You produce STRICT JSON with keys: client_name, summary, compliance_disclaimer. The disclaimer MUST be exactly: "This is not investment advice." Return ONLY valid JSON, no additional text.

sql.description: Text-to-SQL with invariant checking (Â±5% GAAP materiality)

prompts.question: Sum "amount" for region = "NA" between 2025-01-01 and 2025-09-01.
prompts.expected_sql: SELECT SUM(amount) FROM transactions WHERE region = "NA" AND date BETWEEN "2025-01-01" AND "2025-09-01";

prompts.question: Count transactions by category for 2025.
prompts.expected_sql: SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM transactions WHERE date >= "2025-01-01" GROUP BY category;

sql.system_prompt: You write SQLite SQL ONLY. No prose, no explanations. Schema: transactions(id INT, date TEXT, region TEXT, amount REAL, category TEXT). Use double quotes for strings. Return ONLY the SQL query, nothing else.
sql.schema_description: transactions(id INT, date TEXT, region TEXT, amount REAL, category TEXT)
